item.title: Projects
item.description: Project 1 - Starting the sample pack. Work in groups of 2-4 in the recording studio. One person “performs” while the other tracks, and anyone left ofter watches how to track. Pick one thing to record, an instrument or an object. Get at least 10 recordings of distinct sounds. If you’re recording an instrument, don’t just record 10 different tones. Try to get a variety of timbres. Try extended techniques. Experiment with placing the microphone different distances from the audio source.

item.title: Syllabus
